title: How fast and strong is Kratos from God of War? - Quora

response.answer_text: In terms of speed - Kratos is still damn fast… It’s difficult to understand this because the game functions on our reactions… But in terms of feats - Kratos is fast enough to react to Hermes (the fastest Greek God) There are more feats of strength but I’ll keep it short… Kratos and Baldur formed a canyon when they clashed against one another… When Baldur hurled a boulder he was crushed under by Kratos, Kratos smashed it to bits and pieces with a single strike of his shield… Kratos flipped Tyr’s temple- something that hold the Bifrost with it and it pretty much exists simultaneously in all 9 realms… Kratos flipped an inter-dimensional temple… And it was mentioned in the game that “Flip the temple” sounds way too normal… For comic fans - Kratos is fast and strong enough to hold his own against the likes of Wonder Woman and Superman… or Even Hulk and Thor (Thor is about get his butt kicked by Kratos in the next instalment anyway lol)

Well ok lets start with Kratos from God Of War 3. He’s at least Multi-Continent Level but likely higher since he’s equal to Zeus. Killed and easily physically overpowered Cronos, who is confirmed to be only slightly weaker than Atlas. After awakening the Power of Hope, he very casually defeated Fear Zeus, who had become far stronger than before, and forced him to return to his normal form. Speed: Lightspeed combat and reaction speed (Reacted to and caught Hermes, Who dodged the head of Helios.
